scenario_text.value:
Wah?! Yeeep! What are you doing barging in
here like that?!
What do you mean? We’re looking for Miu.

That doesn’t mean you can just force your way
in here! At least knock, you jerks!

Hey, Takuma, something about this room is
different from before.

(Hmm... Between Piyomon’s reaction and what
Agumon just said...)

(...this room is starting to seem
suspicious.)
